p: Unless otherwise specified, we grew human embryonic kidney (HEK) 293FT cells (Thermo Fisher Scientific; #R70007) in Dulbecco’s modified Eagle medium (DMEM) containing 10% fetal bovine serum (FBS), 100 U/mL penicillin/streptomycin, non-essential amino acids, and sodium pyruvate (Thermo Fisher Scientific), at 37 °C with 5% CO 2.
